stockData.longBusinessSummary: Intel Corporation designs, develops, manufactures, markets, and sells computing and related products and services worldwide. The company offers microprocessor and chipset, stand-alone SoC, and multichip package; Computer Systems and Devices; hardware products comprising CPUs, graphics processing units (GPUs), accelerators, and field programmable gate arrays (FPGAs); and memory and storage, connectivity and networking, and other semiconductor products. It also offers silicon and software products; and optimization solutions for workloads, such as AI, cryptography, security, storage, networking, and leverages various features supporting diverse compute environments. In addition, the company provides driving assistance and self-driving solutions; advanced process technologies enabled by an ecosystem of electronic design automation tools, intellectual property, and design services, as well as systems of chips, including advanced packaging technologies, software, and system. Further, it delivers and deploys intelligent edge platforms that allow developers to achieve agility and drive automation using AI for efficient operations with data integrity, as well as provides hardware and software platforms, tools, and ecosystem partnerships for digital transformation from the cloud to edge. The company serves original equipment manufacturers, original design manufacturers, cloud service providers, and other manufacturers and service providers. Intel Corporation was incorporated in 1968 and is headquartered in Santa Clara, California.

corporateTransformation.name: Corporate Transformation Signals
corporateTransformation.description: Business model pivots, sector changes, and strategic repositioning

signals.name: Sector Transformation Catalyst
signals.description: Company pivoting to higher-multiple sector

conditions.condition: major acquisition OR business model announcement AND sector PE ratio > current sector PE * 2
defense OR AI OR biotech pivot AND managementChanges AND acquisition value > marketCap * 0.5
government contract OR regulatory approval pathway AND new sector TAM > current TAM * 10

signals.name: Strategic Leadership Changes
signals.description: Executive hires with sector expertise

conditions.condition: new CEO OR CTO with target sector experience > 10 years
multiple C-level hires from target sector within 90 days

signals.name: Float Reduction Events
signals.description: Mechanical float reduction creating volatility amplification

conditions.condition: reverse split ratio >= 5:1 AND float < 10M post-split
reverse split ratio >= 8:1 AND float < 5M post-split AND catalyst within 180 days
buyback program > 20% OR float < 3M AND upcoming catalyst

volume.name: Enhanced Volume Intelligence
volume.description: Sophisticated volume pattern analysis with quality metrics

signals.name: Institutional Accumulation Pattern
signals.description: Extended accumulation with quality volume metrics

conditions.condition: volume >= avgVolume21d * 1.5 for 10+ days AND priceChange <= 0.15 AND darkPoolRatio >= 0.25
volume >= avgVolume21d * 2.0 for 15+ days AND blockTrades > avgBlockTrades * 3 AND priceChange <= 0.20
volume >= avgVolume21d * 2.5 for 20+ days AND 13F filings show new positions AND priceChange <= 0.25

signals.name: Explosive Volume Breakout
signals.description: Extreme volume spikes indicating major moves

conditions.condition: volume >= avgVolume30d * 25 AND floatTurnover >= 1.0
volume >= avgVolume30d * 50 AND floatTurnover >= 2.0
volume >= avgVolume30d * 100 AND floatTurnover >= 5.0

signals.name: Volume Dry-Up Pattern
signals.description: Volume compression before explosive moves

conditions.condition: volume <= avgVolume20d * 0.5 for 5+ days AND volatility <= 20dayAvgVolatility * 0.7
volume <= avgVolume20d * 0.3 for 7+ days AND known catalyst within 14 days

signals.name: Float Multiple Analysis
signals.description: Tracking how many times float trades

conditions.condition: floatTurnover >= 0.5 in single day
floatTurnover >= 1.0 in single day
floatTurnover >= 3.0 in single day

technical.name: Advanced Technical Pattern Recognition
technical.description: Enhanced technical indicators with compression patterns

signals.name: Extreme Volatility Compression
signals.description: Bollinger Band squeeze indicating coiled spring setup

conditions.condition: bollingerBandWidth <= 10th percentile for 20+ days
bollingerBandWidth <= 5th percentile for 30+ days AND RSI showing divergence
bollingerBandWidth <= 2nd percentile for 45+ days AND catalyst within 30 days

signals.name: Extended Base Building
signals.description: Prolonged consolidation creating launch pad

conditions.condition: priceRange20d <= 15% for 90+ days AND supportTests >= 3
priceRange20d <= 10% for 120+ days AND volume declining
priceRange20d <= 8% for 180+ days AND multiple support tests

signals.name: Oversold Divergence Setup
signals.description: Oversold with positive momentum divergence

conditions.condition: rsi14 <= 25 AND williamsR <= -90 for 5+ days
rsi14 <= 25 AND rsi14 > rsi14_previous AND price <= price_previous
oversold divergence AND volume increase AND catalyst proximity

signals.name: Breakout Pattern Validation
signals.description: Multi-timeframe breakout confirmation

conditions.condition: price > 20day high AND volume > 2x average
price > 50day high AND volume > 3x average AND RSI > 50

microstructure.name: Enhanced Market Microstructure
microstructure.description: Refined float analysis with volatility amplification factors

signals.name: Volatility Amplification Zone
signals.description: Market cap and float combination optimized for explosive moves

conditions.condition: marketCap >= 2000000 AND marketCap <= 100000000 AND floatShares <= 20000000
marketCap >= 5000000 AND marketCap <= 50000000 AND floatShares <= 10000000
marketCap >= 2000000 AND marketCap <= 25000000 AND floatShares <= 5000000

signals.name: Float Composition Analysis
signals.description: Insider and institutional ownership creating scarcity

conditions.condition: insiderOwnership >= 20% AND institutionalOwnership >= 10%
insiderOwnership >= 30% AND institutionalOwnership >= 15% AND effectiveFloat <= 50% of outstanding
combined ownership >= 60% AND effectiveFloat <= 30% of outstanding

signals.name: Enhanced Short Squeeze Metrics
signals.description: Advanced short interest analysis with covering dynamics

conditions.condition: shortInterest >= 20% AND daysToCover >= 3 AND borrowRate >= 10%
shortInterest >= 35% AND daysToCover >= 5 AND borrowRate >= 25%
shortInterest >= 50% AND daysToCover >= 7 AND borrowRate >= 50%
